resources.string: " DROP TABLE IF EXISTS route DROP TABLE IF EXISTS point DROP TABLE IF EXISTS visited DROP TABLE IF EXISTS states DROP TABLE IF EXISTS starPosition DROP TABLE IF EXISTS userdata "

" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS route(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, routeId INTEGER, color INTEGER, title TEXT, extra TEXT, current INTEGER) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comment(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, apiId INTEGER, routeId INTEGER, z INTEGER, starPosX REAL, starPosY REAL, message TEXT, sender TEXT, date TEXT, lang TEXT) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS point(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, pointId INTEGER, title TEXT, place INTEGER, radius INTEGER, latitude REAL, longitude REAL, routeId INTEGER) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS userdata(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, userId INTEGER, starPosX REAL, starPosY REAL, message TEXT, sender TEXT, routeId INTEGER, date TEXT, seenAnimation INTEGER, userlang TEXT) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visited(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, visited INTEGER) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS states(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, stateId INTEGER, stateValue INTEGER) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS starPosition(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, xPos REAL, yPos REAL) CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS skyPosition(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, xPos INTEGER, yPos INTEGER) INSERT INTO userdata(userId, starPosX, starPosY, message, sender, routeId, date, seenAnimation, userlang) VALUES(0, 0, 0, 'null', 'null', 0, '0', 0, 'SE') INSERT INTO states(stateId, stateValue) VALUES(1, 1) INSERT INTO states(stateId, stateValue) VALUES(2, 1) "

"The mobile phone drama Maryam by Rebecca Forsberg tells of Maryam Al-Ijliya who lived in tenth century Aleppo, Syria. She constructed and manufactured astrolabes, tools for determining location, used in astronomy, astrology and navigation. Maryam's father was apprenticed to a famous manufacturer of astrolabes in Bagdad and Maryam in turn, became his pupil. Her handcrafted design was so innovative that she was employed by the city's regent, Sayf al-Dawla, from the year 944 to 967. Maryam's Astrolabium included the holidays and languages of different religions and cultures so that it was useable to many groups in society, for example to determine the beginning and end of Ramadan. The Astrolabium was not unlike a modern smart phone.

"Maryam is a mobile phone drama in the form of an app that is playable in cities around Sweden. Maryam is the third part of the Women in Science trilogy, portraying female pioneers of science, relating to modern research while simultaneously exploring new routes for theatre to reach a wider audience.

Maryam is produced by Rats Theatre in cooperation with The Royal Dramatic Theatre and the Department of Computer and Systems Sciences at Stockholm University.

Premier May 7th, 2013.

Writer and director: Rebecca Forsberg
Maryam: Linda Lönnerfeldt
The father: Staffan Göthe
Additional voices: Elever vid Kista Folkhögskola - Lina Abbas, Ahmed Abdalla, Wafaa Aljuburi, Fadwa Aqel, Boshra Ayobi, Nadia Bechbech, Sheima Biniaz, Ouided Dakhili, Mohamadeya Elhaj, Aicha Kalef, Zahra Khadim, Sun Hui Ko, Venus Mohammed, Marian Osman Abdulle, Sophia Sharif Yusuf, Leila Shejk Omar, Ehtesham Thanvi, samt läraren Karin Westberg.
Scenic designer: Peter Hagdahl
Sound designer: Anders Bennysson
Recording technician: Tina Pålsson
Music: Johan Sundhage/ Klevgränd produktion
Graphic design: Mia Degerman och Lina Åberg/EBDC
App production Iphone: Klevgränd produktion
App production Android: Joakim Johansson, Fredrik Lundin, studenter vid Institutionen för data- och systemvetenskap, Stockholms universitet.
Marketing: Cilla Fredsberg
Producer: Rebecca Medici"
Now return to your starting position.
The routes cannot be downloaded. Make sure you have a solid internet connection.
You have to fill in a comment before posting
Find the place where you play the first scene of the drama.
Enter one of your own thoughts into the Starry Sky. You can do this after you have finished listening.
When you have finished listening, move on to another position. You chose which one.
The last scene plays in the same location as the starting scenes. Go there to finish the drama.
Here you can choose if you want to see stars with thoughts from every country in any language or if you prefer just to read uploaded thoughts in English.
Your internet connection need to be activated for the app to work. Activate the 3G/4G on your device and try again or click Close to close the application.
Your position cannot be determined. Activate your GPS function and allow your phone to use networks for locating your position.
Your position cannot be determined. Try opening the Google maps application on your phone to see if your position can be resolved there, then return to this application. Press Close to exit.
Press back twice to exit the application
Your answer will be entered as a light in the Starry Sky.
You already have one route ongoing. Would you like to continue or start a new one?
Server problem, please try again later
Here you can upload your own thoughts and read other people\'s.
But first you must walk through the entire play.
You are now in position! Before starting - don\'t forget to wear headphones.
To experience the play you must go to the nearest starting position.
Your star is being uploaded to the sky
